channel.title: Facts Are Optional
channel.itunes:subtitle: Facts Are Optional Podcast
channel.itunes:author: Jeremy and Liz
channel.itunes:summary: Facts are optional. What is real? What is not? We don’t know either, but we’ll figure it out together.
channel.description: Facts are optional. What is real? What is not? We don’t know either, but we’ll figure it out together.

item.title: Ep. 02 - “Press Who’s Coming to Dinner”
item.itunes:author: Jeremy and Liz
item.itunes:subtitle: Press Who’s Coming to Dinner
item.itunes:summary: who are these people with their microphones, notepads, and cameras? And where do they get the right to stick their noses in…

item.title: Ep. 01 - "You Can’t Say Shit"
item.itunes:author: Jeremy and Liz
item.itunes:subtitle: You Can’t Say Shit
item.itunes:summary: For a seemingly well-liked freedom, the right to free speech has a controversial past and present. How did it come about? When was it challenged? Will it survive? We take look at all of it in a not-so-serious manner.
